description:
FBI Director Christopher Wray says advances in generative AI make it easier for election interference and meddling easier than before.

The post The US is Bracing for Complex, Fast-Moving Threats to Elections This Year, FBI Director Warns appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: The US is Bracing for Complex, Fast-Moving Threats to Elections This Year, FBI Director Warns

description:
Noteworthy stories that might have slipped under the radar: Unpatched Google vulnerability exploited, 3D printers hacked by white hats, WhatsApp will get NSO spyware. 

The post In Other News: Google Flaw Exploited, 3D Printers Hacked, WhatsApp Gets NSO Spyware appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: In Other News: Google Flaw Exploited, 3D Printers Hacked, WhatsApp Gets NSO Spyware

description:
The US has charged an Iranian company’s employee over cyberattacks on State and Treasury Departments and defense contractors.

The post US Charges Iranian Over Cyberattacks on Government, Defense Organizations appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: US Charges Iranian Over Cyberattacks on Government, Defense Organizations

description:
Restaurant chain Golden Corral says personal information was compromised in an August 2023 data breach.

The post Golden Corral Data Breach Impacts 180,000 Employees appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Golden Corral Data Breach Impacts 180,000 Employees

description:
Silence Laboratories will invest the new funds in the research and development of privacy-enhancing technologies.

The post Silence Laboratories Raises $4.1 Million to Protect Sensitive Information appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Silence Laboratories Raises $4.1 Million to Protect Sensitive Information

description:
US government agencies warn of Backmydata, Devos, Eight, Elking, and Faust ransomware attacks connected to Phobos.

The post Critical Infrastructure Organizations Warned of Phobos Ransomware Attacks appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Critical Infrastructure Organizations Warned of Phobos Ransomware Attacks

description:
Credentials stored on Ivanti VPN appliances impacted by recent vulnerabilities are likely compromised, government agencies say.

The post Governments Urge Organizations to Hunt for Ivanti VPN Attacks appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Governments Urge Organizations to Hunt for Ivanti VPN Attacks

description:
CISA says a high-severity elevation of privilege vulnerability in Microsoft Streaming Service is actively exploited in the wild.

The post CISA Warns of Windows Streaming Service Vulnerability Exploitation appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: CISA Warns of Windows Streaming Service Vulnerability Exploitation

description:
Hackers stole "sensitive information" including military and government documents from telecom giant Chunghwa Telecom and sold it on the dark web, the island's ministry of national defense said.

The post Hackers Stole ‘Sensitive’ Data From Taiwan Telecom Giant: Ministry appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Hackers Stole ‘Sensitive’ Data From Taiwan Telecom Giant: Ministry

description:
Industry professionals comment on the official release of the NIST Cybersecurity Framework 2.0.

title: Industry Reactions to NIST Cybersecurity Framework 2.0: Feedback Friday
